Projects.info: Human Rights In Saudia Arabia (HRC) -Under Development

Experience.role: UX & DesignOps Lead driving end-to-end experience across web platform and mobile app. Leading UX strategy, service flows, and UI specifications while owning DesignOps operations and governance. Building and scaling the design system for both platform and app (tokens, components, patterns, documentation) to ensure consistency and accessibility. Establishing design workflows, review rituals, and handoff standards with Business Analysts, developers, and QA to align requirements, reduce rework, and speed delivery. Supporting delivery through clarifications, UAT validation, and design QA. Partnered with the engineering team to rebuild key pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring pixel-perfect implementation and a measurable improvement in usability.

UI/UX Designer engineer Improve the User experience process in the platform and mobile app. Creating a Design System for the platform and mobile app. Working closely with Business analysts, developers, and QA testers ensuring that the product is developed according to experience and design specifications. Moreover, I was involved with the development team, as we used HTML, CSS, and Javascript to rebuild all pages.

I was the UX/UI Lead in a team of 4 and we completed this project over the course of 5 months. I was in charge of coming up with ideas for re-designing the layout and for improving the overall user experience using sketching, wireframing and Prototyping. Moreover, I was involved with the development team, as we used HTML, VUE js and Javascript to rebuild all pages.
